original_text: And the priest shall go forth out of the camp; and the priest shall look, and, behold, if the plague of leprosy be healed in the leper;
korean_text: 제사장은 진영에서 나가 진찰할지니 그 환자에게 있던 나병 환부가 나았으면

sentences.original_text: And the priest shall go forth out of the camp
and, behold, if the plague of leprosy be healed
